Instance.description: Zone director for the Breaking and Entering situation.

Tunable.name: break_in_zone_buff
Tunable.description: The buff applied to all sims who are part of a group that initiated a Break In Situation. Only active while the sim is on the Break In lot after the PlayerGroup Break In situation has completed.

Tunable.name: resident_return_situation
Tunable.description: The situation we want resident sims to run when the time is right.
